properties.title: ShorelineMonitor Raw Series
properties.description: Parquet dataset with ShorlineMonitor Raw Series for this region.

table:columns.name: time
table:columns.description: Annual shoreline position timestamp.

table:columns.name: tr_name
table:columns.description: A unique identifier for each transect, constructed from three key components: the 'coastline_id', 'segment_id', and 'interpolated_distance'. The 'coastline_id' corresponds to the FID in OpenStreetMap (OSM) and is prefixed with 'cl'. The 'segment_id' indicates the segment of the OSM coastline split by a UTM grid, prefixed with 's'. The 'interpolated_distance' represents the distance from the starting point of the coastline to the transect, interpolated along the segment, and is prefixed with 'tr'. The complete structure is 'cl[coastline_id]s[segment_id]tr[interpolated_distance]', exemplified by 'cl32946s04tr08168547'. This composition ensures each transect name is a distinct and informative representation of its geographical and spatial attributes.

table:columns.name: obs_group
table:columns.description: Group of shoreline position observations from the same Shoreline Monitor shoreline linestring. The observations on the group are considered to find the representative shoreline position.

table:columns.name: source_file
table:columns.description: Indicates Shoreline Monitor BOX and file source.

table:columns.name: utm_crs
table:columns.description: EPSG code representing the UTM Coordinate Reference System for the shoreline position observation.

table:columns.name: geometry
table:columns.description: Well-Known Binary (WKB) representation of the shoreline position as a point geometry.

table:columns.name: lon
table:columns.description: Longitude of the shoreline position observation.

table:columns.name: lat
table:columns.description: Latitude of the shoreline position observation.

table:columns.name: shoreline_chainage
table:columns.description: Represent the shoreline position in reference to the transect origin in meter.

table:columns.name: shoreline_position
table:columns.description: Represent the shoreline position in reference to the last non-outlier primary observation on each transect in meter.

table:columns.name: shoreline_sinuosity
table:columns.description: Indicates the sinuosity of the source ShorelineMonitor coastline. The Sinuosity calculates the ratio between total coastline length to a straight line from coastline's start point to end point.

table:columns.name: is_shoal
table:columns.description: Indicate whether the shoreline observation lies on a very small island. This criteria is based on the GCTS's properties. The column indicates true for shoreline point observation on closed coastline transect with length less than 10 km.

table:columns.name: obs_group_stdev
table:columns.description: Standard deviation of the observations within an observation group, providing a measure of variability or dispersion among the data points.

table:columns.name: obs_group_range
table:columns.description: Range between the minimum and maximum observations within an observation group, highlighting the spread of values.

table:columns.name: obs_group_count
table:columns.description: Total number of observations within a group, indicating the volume of data points collected for a specific transect.

table:columns.name: obs_is_primary
table:columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the observation is considered the primary data point for its respective year and transect, typically representing the most reliable or significant observation.

table:columns.name: obs_is_qa
table:columns.description: Boolean flag representing whether the observation has passed quality assurance checks, ensuring data integrity and reliability.

table:columns.name: obs_is_outlier
table:columns.description: Boolean indicator of whether an observation is categorized as an outlier based on a specific statistical method, such as the Median Absolute Deviation.

table:columns.name: obs_primary_mdn
table:columns.description: Median of the primary observations for shoreline positions, providing a central value that minimizes the effect of outliers and skewed data.

table:columns.name: obs_count
table:columns.description: Total count of observations recorded, reflecting the comprehensive dataset collected over time for the analysis.

table:columns.name: mdn_offset
table:columns.description: Offset distance from the median of primary observations on the same transect, used to analyze deviations and trends in shoreline positions.

table:columns.name: tr_is_qa
table:columns.description: Quality assurance flag for the transect, indicating whether the transect data meets predefined quality criteria.

table:columns.name: tr_stdev
table:columns.description: Standard deviation of observations across a transect, measuring the variability or spread of shoreline positions.

table:columns.name: tr_range
table:columns.description: Range of observations from minimum to maximum along a transect, illustrating the extent of shoreline positional changes.

table:columns.name: quadkey
table:columns.description: QuadKey code corresponding to the transect's origin at zoom level 12, based on the Bing Maps Tile System for spatial indexing and map visualization.

data.title: ShorelineMonitor Raw Series
data.description: Parquet dataset with ShorlineMonitor Raw Series for this region.
